<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Markets: </strong></span><span>What happened in the stock market yesterday will require more unpacking than a two-sentence blurb can offer, so keep reading for the full story. One thing to call out, though: The CBOE Volatility Index (VIX), the preferred “</span><span><a href="https://finance.yahoo.com/news/stock-market-news-live-updates-september-20-2021-105919123.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">fear gauge</a></span><span>” on Wall Street, jumped to a four-month high.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Covid: </strong></span><span>Pfizer said its vaccine is </span><span><a href="https://apnews.com/article/business-science-health-coronavirus-pandemic-coronavirus-vaccine-202cb6e44b90270ec4d1f19690ed94c5?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">safe and effective</a></span><span> for children ages 5 to 11, welcome news considering kids now account for more than 20% of new cases. The company will apply for FDA authorization for younger children by the end of the month.</span>
</li>

<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
STOCKS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/09/20/highflying-stocks-fall-months?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
How Stocks Started Off the Week
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/09/20/highflying-stocks-fall-months?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Belly flop vid" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=376 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/SiKqNZqksVYWmQEMjd/giphy.gif?cid=ecf05e47t5ol39x7dt6wy00b9okefyqpnzgy9vpvso2vha65&rid=giphy.gif&ct=g">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Belly flop vid" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/SiKqNZqksVYWmQEMjd/giphy.gif?cid=ecf05e47t5ol39x7dt6wy00b9okefyqpnzgy9vpvso2vha65&rid=giphy.gif&ct=g">
<!--<![endif]-->
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">We wrote in Monday morning’s newsletter that the September stock sell-off “hasn’t been that steep.” Looks like we angered the ghost of Adam Smith, because US stocks had their <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/09/19/stock-market-futures-open-to-close-news.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">worst day in months</a>, following similarly miserable trading days for Asian and European markets.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">What happened? </strong>It’s always rough sledding for stocks in September, which is historically the worst month for US equities. Plus, stocks typically save their worst performances for the second half of the month.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But if you’re looking for a specific goat to scape, the Evergrande crisis is one place to start. Global financial markets could be spooked by the potential collapse of the Chinese real estate giant, which is more than <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/09/19/business/china-evergrande-debt-protests.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">$300 billion</a> in debt and faces a big payment deadline on Thursday. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The Chinese government could still step in to save Evergrande, but...it could also let it crash and burn to teach the country’s real estate industry a lesson in reckless spending. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The sell-off is likely not Evergrande-specific, though. </strong>Perhaps it’s just that an <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/u-s-stock-market-faces-potentially-bumpy-autumn-wall-street-analysts-warn-11631439002?mod=article_inline" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">epic run is losing steam</a>. The S&P has hit an all-time high more than 50 times this year, and has remained within 5% of its record for the last 220+ days. Analysts from Citigroup, Bank of America, and others warned that a bumpier fall was possible because, well, “What good news is left? A lot of optimism is already priced in,” BofA Securities wrote. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">So what’s next?</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Experts say persistently high Covid cases, lower consumer sentiment, and overblown valuations could lead to an even larger pullback as Meg Ryan fall gets underway. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>In a </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-09-20/morgan-stanley-s-wilson-sees-growing-risk-of-20-drop-in-s-p-500?utm_source=twitter&utm_campaign=socialflow-organic&utm_content=canada&utm_medium=social&cmpid%3D=socialflow-twitter-canada" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">new note</a></span><span>, Morgan Stanley analysts said their optimistic view is a 10% downturn in the S&P 500. Their worst-case, and increasingly likely, scenario is a plunge of more than 20%. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>Absent catastrophic news, periodic downturns in the stock market are like receiving a granola bar on Halloween—disappointing but still healthy. JPMorgan analysts, for one, joined many social media users in <a href="https://twitter.com/carlquintanilla/status/1440000474778849282?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">advocating</a> for #buyingthedip. —<em>NF</em></p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
ENERGY
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/09/20/europes-natural-gas-shortage-coming-us?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Europe’s Running out of Gas
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/09/20/europes-natural-gas-shortage-coming-us?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Natural gas tubes in the shape of a dollar sign" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC83NDkyL25hdHVyYWxfZ2FzLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em><em>Francis Scialabba</em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Add natural gas to the “way too expensive” list along with space travel and succulents. Europe is facing a <a href="https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/global-markets-gas-2021-09-20/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">serious gas crisis</a> after prices have surged 280% this year, compounding supply crunches in areas like food, shipping, and home energy.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Two fertilizer plants that supplied 60% of the UK’s CO2 for </span><span><a href="https://www.cnn.com/2021/09/20/business/uk-gas-prices-food-supply/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">food and beverage production</a></span><span> were forced to close. Now, experts are warning that food (and even worse, beer) shortages could hit European consumers within weeks.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Some UK steel producers have also stopped production because of the outrageous energy costs.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">What’s going on? </strong>There’s just not enough gas getting to the right places right now. A number of factors, including rising demand around the world for heat and lower supplies being delivered from Russia, are contributing to the crunch.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>elevated natural gas prices aren’t just a European problem. Prices in the US have increased over 100% already this year, and depending on how cold it gets this winter, we could all face uber-expensive heating bills—especially if you live in <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-09-20/new-england-california-to-see-soaring-energy-costs-this-winter?srnd=premium" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">New England and California</a>. —<em>MM</em></p>

<tr>
<td style="padding-top: 12px;">

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TRAVEL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/09/20/us-eases-travel-restrictions-vaccinated-foreigners?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
We Missed You, Tourists
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/09/20/us-eases-travel-restrictions-vaccinated-foreigners?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="LAKE BUENA VISTA, FL - OCTOBER 01: Walt Disney World Resort marked its 4..." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC83NDk4L3dhbHRfZGlzbmV5X3dvcmxkX3Jlc29ydC5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Handout/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The White House said fully vaccinated international visitors will be allowed to <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-09-20/u-s-to-ease-restrictions-on-travel-from-eu-and-u-k-ft-reports?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">enter the US</a> starting in early November. That's a big update to current travel policies that ban entry for foreigners who’ve been in a handful of countries, including China, India, and most of the EU, within two weeks of trying to enter the US.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Why it matters: </strong>It's a big win for companies that rely on international tourism, such as airlines. More than 70% of adults in Europe are fully vaccinated, and airlines hope European tourists will want to fulfill their Disney World fantasies during the upcoming holiday season. Transatlantic routes were the most profitable segment of the aviation market before Covid-19, filled with premium travelers willing to pay extra for more legroom. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>“We are simply not Virgin without the Atlantic," Virgin Atlantic’s CEO Shai Weiss said. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>After the EU opened its borders to Americans in June, European leaders were peeved that the US didn’t return the favor. For them, this move is way overdue. —<em>SQ</em></p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">

</p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Rumor has it that the biggest selling point for the newest iPhone will be the enhanced camera. But we’re not just telling you this so you can take better selfies.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://www.fool.com/ecap/apple-just-invested-410-million-in-this-small-te-2/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=contentmarketing&utm_campaign=apple2021-applearvrshort&aid=10589&paid=10589&waid=10589&source=esamnbwdg0500007&psource=esamnbwdg0500007&wsource=esamnbwdg0500007&testId=e-sa-apple-arvr&cellId=0&campaign=sa-apple-2021" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">The Motley Fool</a>’s feelers are tingling, because <strong style="color:#000">behind the newest iPhone, they’ve spotted some possibly huge investing potential</strong>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">While everyone and their mother is focused on Apple shares, The Motley Fool’s radar has caught a tiny company behind their latest breakthrough. This company makes an essential part of the new iPhone’s camera, and <strong style="color:#000">Tim Cook himself has said the tech this company helps achieve is critical to Apple’s future</strong>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">When Apple’s <em>dad</em> calls a company critical, <a href="https://www.fool.com/ecap/apple-just-invested-410-million-in-this-small-te-2/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=contentmarketing&utm_campaign=apple2021-applearvrshort&aid=10589&paid=10589&waid=10589&source=esamnbwdg0500007&psource=esamnbwdg0500007&wsource=esamnbwdg0500007&testId=e-sa-apple-arvr&cellId=0&campaign=sa-apple-2021" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">The Motley Fool</a> pays attention. With 44% of current iPhone users ready to upgrade to the newest model, they think this could spell potential windfall for the lesser known company behind the lens.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Curious? <a href="https://www.fool.com/ecap/apple-just-invested-410-million-in-this-small-te-2/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=contentmarketing&utm_campaign=apple2021-applearvrshort&aid=10589&paid=10589&waid=10589&source=esamnbwdg0500007&psource=esamnbwdg0500007&wsource=esamnbwdg0500007&testId=e-sa-apple-arvr&cellId=0&campaign=sa-apple-2021" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Learn more about The Motley Fool’s pick here</a>.</p>

</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/09/20/key-performance-indicators-september-21?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">

<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/09/20/key-performance-indicators-september-21?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="People visiting the Covid installation at the national mall" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC83NDk1L3Blb3BsZV92aXNpdGluZ190aGVfY292aWRfaW5zdGFsbGF0aW9uX2F0X3RoZV9uYXRpb25hbF9tYWxsLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Kent Nishimura / Los Angeles Times via Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Stat: </strong>More Americans (675,000) have now been <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/09/20/covid-is-americas-deadliest-pandemic-as-us-fatalities-near-1918-flu-estimates.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">killed</a> by Covid-19 than the Spanish flu in 1918–19, making the coronavirus the US’ deadliest pandemic. Hundreds of thousands of white flags have been <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2021/sep/17/us-coronavirus-art-installation-white-flags?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">placed</a> on the National Mall in Washington, DC, to remember those who have died.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Quote: </strong>“I’ve heard that people in their teens and 20s today are being referred to as Covid’s lost generation. I think it’s a stretch to say they’re lost, just because the path they tread can’t be seen by grown-up eyes.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">RM, a member of the K-pop boy band BTS, delivered some remarks at the UN General Assembly in New York yesterday. More than 1 million viewers <a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2021/09/20/bts-at-unga/?utm_source=feedly&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=wp_world" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">tuned in</a> to BTS's speech.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Read: </strong>What I learned from a year on Substack. (<a href="https://www.platformer.news/p/what-i-learned-from-a-year-on-substack?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Platformer</a>)</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SOCIAL MEDIA
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/09/20/gabby-petito-case-turns-realtime-entertainment-tiktok?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Trending on TikTok: True Crime
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/09/20/gabby-petito-case-turns-realtime-entertainment-tiktok?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Gabby Petito case videos go viral on TikTok" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC83NDkzL2dhYmJ5X3BldGl0b19oYXNodGFnX29uX3Rpa3Rvay5wbmciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>TikTok</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Amateur detectives have <a href="https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/tanyachen/tiktoks-obsession-with-the-gabby-petito-case?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">flooded TikTok</a> after Gabby Petito, a 22-year-old #VanLife influencer, went missing on a road trip with her fiancé, Brian Laundrie, in August. Over the past month, many TikTok users sifted through Petito’s and Laundrie’s social media profiles for clues and turned Petito's case into one of the most viral moments of the year.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Petito’s Instagram, which had around 1,000 followers at the time of her disappearance, has more than 854,000 followers as of last night.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The #GabbyPetito hashtag on TikTok has over half a billion views. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">On Sunday, the FBI <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2021/09/20/us/gabby-petito-brian-laundrie-update/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">found</a> human remains that they believe to be Petito’s in a location reportedly close to where some YouTubers claimed they saw her van.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>While tips from the public can be useful for cracking a case, TikTok sleuths are being accused of co-opting a traumatic episode for one family into self-promotional content.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">For more: </strong>Read this <a href="https://twitter.com/abbieasr/status/1438580953211981826?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">thread</a> by a TikTok researcher for an in-depth breakdown. <em>–SQ</em></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"></p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Brew Mini: </strong><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/09/20/brew-mini-festival?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Complete the puzzle here</a>, then share it with your coworkers to see if they can beat you.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">UN Pop Quiz</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The 76th session of the UN General Assembly begins today in New York City. Here are 4 rapid-fire questions that test your knowledge of the organization.</p>
<ol>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Name 3 of the 6 official UN languages.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>What is the leader of the UN called? </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Which country was most recently added as a member state?  </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Name the five countries that are permanent members of the UN Security Council.</span></li>
</ol>

style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eGiphy\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWe wrote in Monday morning’s newsletter that the September stock sell-off “hasn’t been that steep.” Looks like we angered the ghost of Adam Smith, because US stocks had their \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/09/19/stock-market-futures-open-to-close-news.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eworst day in months\u003c/a\u003e, following similarly miserable trading days for Asian and European markets.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhat happened? \u003c/strong\u003eIt’s always rough sledding for stocks in September, which is historically the worst month for US equities. Plus, stocks typically save their worst performances for the second half of the month.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut if you’re looking for a specific goat to scape, the Evergrande crisis is one place to start. Global financial markets could be spooked by the potential collapse of the Chinese real estate giant, which is more than \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2021/09/19/business/china-evergrande-debt-protests.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e$300 billion\u003c/a\u003e in debt and faces a big payment deadline on Thursday. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe Chinese government could still step in to save Evergrande, but...it could also let it crash and burn to teach the country’s real estate industry a lesson in reckless spending. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe sell-off is likely not Evergrande-specific, though. \u003c/strong\u003ePerhaps it’s just that an \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/u-s-stock-market-faces-potentially-bumpy-autumn-wall-street-analysts-warn-11631439002?mod=article_inline\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eepic run is losing steam\u003c/a\u003e. The S\u0026P has hit an all-time high more than 50 times this year, and has remained within 5% of its record for the last 220+ days. Analysts from Citigroup, Bank of America, and others warned that a bumpier fall was possible because, well, “What good news is left? A lot of optimism is already priced in,” BofA Securities wrote. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eSo what’s next?\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eExperts say persistently high Covid cases, lower consumer sentiment, and overblown valuations could lead to an even larger pullback as Meg Ryan fall gets underway. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eIn a \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-09-20/morgan-stanley-s-wilson-sees-growing-risk-of-20-drop-in-s-p-500?utm_source=twitter\u0026utm_campaign=socialflow-organic\u0026utm_content=canada\u0026utm_medium=social\u0026cmpid%3D=socialflow-twitter-canada\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003enew note\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e, Morgan Stanley analysts said their optimistic view is a 10% downturn in the S\u0026P 500. Their worst-case, and increasingly likely, scenario is a plunge of more than 20%. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eAbsent catastrophic news, periodic downturns in the stock market are like receiving a granola bar on Halloween—disappointing but still healthy. JPMorgan analysts, for one, joined many social media users in \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/carlquintanilla/status/1440000474778849282?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eadvocating\u003c/a\u003e for #buyingthedip. —\u003cem\u003eNF\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAdd natural gas to the “way too expensive” list along with space travel and succulents. Europe is facing a \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/global-markets-gas-2021-09-20/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eserious gas crisis\u003c/a\u003e after prices have surged 280% this year, compounding supply crunches in areas like food, shipping, and home energy.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eTwo fertilizer plants that supplied 60% of the UK’s CO2 for \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2021/09/20/business/uk-gas-prices-food-supply/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efood and beverage production\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e were forced to close. Now, experts are warning that food (and even worse, beer) shortages could hit European consumers within weeks.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSome UK steel producers have also stopped production because of the outrageous energy costs.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhat’s going on? \u003c/strong\u003eThere’s just not enough gas getting to the right places right now. A number of factors, including rising demand around the world for heat and lower supplies being delivered from Russia, are contributing to the crunch.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eelevated natural gas prices aren’t just a European problem. Prices in the US have increased over 100% already this year, and depending on how cold it gets this winter, we could all face uber-expensive heating bills—especially if you live in \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-09-20/new-england-california-to-see-soaring-energy-costs-this-winter?srnd=premium\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eNew England and California\u003c/a\u003e. —\u003cem\u003eMM\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe White House said fully vaccinated international visitors will be allowed to \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-09-20/u-s-to-ease-restrictions-on-travel-from-eu-and-u-k-ft-reports?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" That's a big update to current travel policies that ban entry for foreigners who’ve been in a handful of countries, including China, India, and most of the EU, within two weeks of trying to enter the US.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhy it matters: \u003c/strong\u003eIt's a big win for companies that rely on international tourism, such as airlines. More than 70% of adults in Europe are fully vaccinated, and airlines hope European tourists will want to fulfill their Disney World fantasies during the upcoming holiday season. Transatlantic routes were the most profitable segment of the aviation market before Covid-19, filled with premium travelers willing to pay extra for more legroom. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003e“We are simply not Virgin without the Atlantic,\" Virgin Atlantic’s CEO Shai Weiss said. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eAfter the EU opened its borders to Americans in June, European leaders were peeved that the US didn’t return the favor.
